name: html
description: Use this in case you want to output HTML - Removes markup that may contain XSS risks.

name: text
description: Use this for simple HTML content - Encodes all HTML.

name: elementName
description: Allows only element names that are white-listed, outputs 'div' otherwise.
additionalDescription: Allowed tags: section, nav, article, aside, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, header, footer, address, main, p, pre, blockquote, ol, li, dl, dt, dd, figure, figcaption, div, a, em, strong, small, s, cite, q, dfn, abbr, data, time, code, var, samp, kbd, sub, sup, i, b, u, mark, ruby, rt, rp, bdi, bdo, span, br, wbr, ins, del, table, caption, colgroup, col, tbody, thead, tfoot, tr, td, th

name: attributeName
description: Outputs nothing if the value doesn't correspond to the HTML attribute name syntax - doesn't allow 'style' and 'on*' attributes.

name: uri
description: Outputs nothing if the value contains XSS risks.

name: scriptToken
description: Outputs nothing if the value doesn't correspond to the JavaScript token syntax.

name: scriptComment
description: Context for JavaScript block comments. Outputs nothing if value is trying to break out of the comment context.

name: styleToken
description: Outputs nothing if the value doesn't correspond to the CSS token syntax.

name: styleComment
description: Context for CSS comments. Outputs noting if value is trying to break out of the comment context.

name: number
description: Outputs zero if the value is not a number.

name: unsafe
description: Use this at your own risk, this disables XSS protection completely.
